data.Name: Know The Score
data.Bio: Originally formed in Ft. Lauderdale, FL in the early 2000’s, Know the Score has released two full-length records and shared the stage with the likes of Blacklisted, Ringworm, Down To Nothing, Terror, Cold World, and 100 Demons as they’ve toured the globe. The band’s debut LP, All Guts, No Glory, was released in 2005 on Goodbye Blue Skies Recordings and their second LP, All Time Low, followed the next year via Eulogy Recordings.  The direct Read more on Last.fm
